title: sArasa pUmpAdam
sahitya:
sArasa pUmpAdam paNivOm samsAra van-tApam tAn taNivOmE


anupallavi

  nIraja viSaya viSattanai uNDu nilaiyillAda ulaga inbamE peridenru ninaindu magizhndadu pOdumE


caraNam    angumingum engumE niraindavan anbillArkku illAdi maraindavan akhila ulaguyirum paDaittaLitt-azhippavan anaittuyirkkum annai tandaiyAi tazhaippavan aruLE vaDivAi aDiyAr uLLamE tiru mALigaiyAi aghalAduraivOn oru pErilan Ayiram pEruDaiyAn karuvAdanai tIravum nam iraivan
